action.text: Pursuant to the provisions of S. Con. Res. 13, H.J. Res. 45 is considered passed House.
Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Senate Committee on Finance discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.
Cloture motion on the joint resolution presented in Senate.
Cloture motion on the joint resolution withdrawn by unanimous consent in Senate.

vote.text: Passed Senate, under the order of 12/22/2009, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, with an amendment by Yea-Nay Vote. 60 - 39. Record Vote Number: 14.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Pursuant to the provisions of H.Res. 1065, the portion of the Senate amendment prior to Title I is considered as agreed to.
Mr. Hoyer moved that the House adopt the second portion of the divided question.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with 1 hour of debate on the second portion of the divided question. The second portion consists of Title I and II of the Senate amendment to H.J. Res. 45.
The previous question was ordered pursuant to the rule.
On motion to adopt the second portion of the divided question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 233 - 187 (Roll no. 48).
